attributes.action: urge Derwentside District Council to answer the concerns of the local residents and local MP.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Derwentside District Council has been in receipt of letters of concern about anti-social behaviour in Consett but since intial letters sent to our local MP in February 2008, the local Council have failed to answer any of the concerns from the local area. Surely the tax paying public should reasonably expect a local council to be answerable to the people paying for the services they provide.
